tweet: Apparently Ringo lived near here once, hence the tour bus. But last year he played here in record time, back on plane b4 rest o gig over!Stv
There is a 'Magical Mystery Tour' bus parked outside now. I think a trip round my own head is more exciting. Lennon would not approve.Stv
...no witnesses. But he could not look me in the eyes again over next 6 years. These days he wld be sent down 4 abuse. Total sadist. Stv
Coreection: Mr Brown strapped the hell out of my hands with a finger still in a hospital splint at eleven, in a dark lecture theatre...
...but cleverly managed godbothering is as bad as cringeworthy happy-clapping. Oops! Nearly forgot I am hypnotising myself these days. Stv
